document.full_text: bosnia's international envoy said thursday he would block a referendum planned by serbs for next month that challenges his authority, calling it the greatest threat yet to the deal that ended the 1990s war.
document.title: bosnia envoy to block "illegal" serb referendum
lines_and_colors: bosnia's international envoy said thursday he would block a referendum planned by serbs for next month that challenges his authority, calling it the greatest threat yet to the deal that ended the 1990s war.
